Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at Kensington Oval, Bridgetown, Barbados, has been good for batting with an average first innings score of 153.
South Africa's key players include Quinton de Kock, Heinrich Klaasen, and David Miller, while India's key players include Rohit Sharma, Suryakumar Yadav, Hardik Pandya, and Jasprit Bumrah.
